name: You Only Die Once (HellRok)
description:
Controls

WASD/Arrow keys/Swipe/Dpad to move around.
Space/Tap/A to confirm or clear away a text box.

Currently swipe controls aren't working correctly in the browser on mobile (at least on Android) so I'm afraid you'll have to play it on a computer.

Story

Your life partner has died leaving you a widow. How are you spend the rest of your life is up to you. With limited time left and every action taking away your health you better be sure the actions you take are what matter most to you!

Also, once you've played this game once, you'll never be able to play it again.

Source Code https://github.com/HellRok/you-only-die-once
